name: Chokoban (BuckO)
description:
Chokoban! A 3D weird small clone of Sokoban...

This is a school project we had a week to work on, apparently....I found out 1 day before the deadline, I thought we had 2 weeks lol...

So here is it! Its 3 levels only due to the amount of time I had left and other homework I had to work on.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------

CONTROLS:

MOVEMENT: WASD
